      • check

        public void check​(ClassLoader classpathLoader,
                  Collection<ByteCodes> byteCodes)
           throws CompilationFailureException
        Check the bytecode from one round of bytecode generation.
        Specified by:
        check in interface ByteCodeChecker
        Parameters:
        classpathLoader - the ClassLoader to use for loading classes from the classpath.
        byteCodes - the bytecodes generated in this round.
        Throws:
        CompilationFailureException - if any issue is discovered in the verification.

                           org.objectweb.asm.tree.ClassNode clazz,
                           List<ByteCodeVerifier.Failure> failures)
        Verify the methods of a single class.
        Parameters:
        check - a helper for verifying assignments.
        clazz - the class to check the methods of.
        failures - where any detected errors are added.
